---
title: "View validation guidelines"
date: last-modified
---

Learn how to view the guidelines for the validation report associated with a template. This topic is relevant for model validaators who need to ensure that they are following the guidelines for their validation report.  

## Prerequisites

* The model you are documenting is registered in the model inventory
* Model documentation has already been submitted for review by the model validation team for this project
* You are logged into the ValidMind Platform

## Steps

1. In the left sidebar, click [**Model Inventory**](https://app.prod.validmind.ai/model-inventory).

2. Select a model by clicking on it or find your model by applying a filter or searching for it.

3. In the left sidebar that appears for your model, click **Validation Report**.

<!--- NR TO DO This looks to be no longer shown in the UI as of March 2024? --->
1. In any section of the validation report, click **ValidMind Insights** in the top-right corner to expand the **ValidMind Insights** sidebar:

   - The **Validation Report Guidelines** tab shows the guidelines associated with this model that have been configured by the model validation team.
   - The **Comments** tab shows the comment threads associated with this section of the validation report.

::: {.column-margin}
::: {.callout-tip}
The validation guidelines for each template can only be configured by an administrator.
:::
:::
